metadata.title: CVE-2016-4974 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Apache Qpid AMQP 0-x JMS client before 6.0.4 and JMS (AMQP 1.0) before0.10.0 does not restrict the use of classes available on the classpath,which might allow remote authenticated users with permission to sendmessages to deserialize arbitrary objects and execute arbitrary code byleveraging a crafted serialized object in a JMS ObjectMessage that ishandled by the getObject function.

criterions.comment: qpid-cpp: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
